description: This file defines a React functional component called 'Board' used for rendering the game board in a Tic Tac Toe game. It includes logic for accessibility labels, styling, handling cell presses, and highlighting winning lines.

methods.name: useBoardA11yLabel
methods.description: Computes an accessibility label for the board based on its current state, describing each row with cell contents.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: React functional component rendering the Tic Tac Toe board with styling, accessibility, and interaction handling.
